title: 10 games chat restriction haHAA
body:
i got 10 games of chat restriction because of a single game where support says i was supposedly toxic, so i asked him to point out where was i toxic he gave me the chat log i asked him to show me the toxicity i still couldnt see it so he gave me this.
Altáir: u are 
Altáir: unreal 
Altáir: idiot 
Altáir: trash 
Altáir: ur so stupid 
Altáir: i cant hanle it 
Altáir: u 1/4 moron 
Altáir: i wouldnt blame u for having no map awareness ur obviously garbage
is that worth 10 games of chat restriction i wonder ?
Edit: i could care less about 10 games of chat restriction i dont even type that much and i dont care...what i do care about is the honor level being 0 and that this could lead to other punishments harsher than this over the same silly reason.

replies.body: This is pure flaming. I don't understand your confusion.
that's very sad , how do u play the game if u find this toxic.

By muting people like you who get off on angering people rather than actually playing the game?

Unfortunately, I can't mute you FOR my teammates and prevent you from harassing my entire team, so it's a good thing Riot stepped in.
whatever u say lad.
You literally just called him "trash" and "idiot", and you still think that's not toxic?
This isn't a lot of chat, but _everything_ in there is derogatory in some way, seemingly to your own team. I'd say it's worthy of the minimum possible punishment.

u are unreal : me to enemy noc when he was ganking for the 3rd time at the same minute and dove me and ended up with me killing him and enemy laner...so that's toxic right ? yeah must be.
(idiot) : to enemy noc when he ganked for probably the 5th time...not nice but not toxic or worthy of the slightest of punishments.
(trash) : when he ganked for the ( i really lost count ) and still not a word worthy of a punishment.
(ur so stupid i cant handle it u 1/4 moron)  : me to my jhin because he was flaming me without knowing i got a very juicy camp so it's only natural to be 4/7.
(i wouldnt blame u for having no map awareness ur obviously garbage) : me to my jhin when he said he didnt see me camped.

u asked for the context, here it is.

this is a competitive game, if riot's gonna punish people for stuff like that maybe they shouldn't have started a competitive game, this is no utopia and as long as im dicussing stuff about the game and not telling people that i slept with a family member or to kill themselves or constantly whinning and trolling and afking and and and and and the endless actually toxic reasons to ban people then i shouldn't be considered a toxic person.

Football is a competitive game. You don't get to call the other team trash repeatedly in different ways, and you *certainly* don't get to call your teammates the same.

Trash **talk** is okay - flaming and harassment is not - and this holds true for every competitive game I have ever seen.
Define "trash talk"

*enemy uses flash for no reason* - "damn nice flash udyr"

*enemy gets your tower down to one shot before dying but then gets executed* - "lol nice play"

*enemy gets 1 kill in a trade, your team gets two* - "was that really worth"

Just some examples.
Please stop calling people morons and you'll be just fine.

yeah that might've been the only word that can be called toxic by riot's standards.
but again it was one word and it wasnt for nothing.

Yup.

Also, there is probably a history of this type of behavior. So it isn't a matter of one game, just this being the most recent I imagine.

for insults this mild and for a very justified reason , self defense and competitive bsing ? no .

You see, imagine playing. And while you are playing, you make a mistake. You get frustrated.

You know what can make that frustration worse? This annoying yappy dog comes in and yaps whenever you make a mistake.

You are being that yappy dog. You aren't mean and hurtful. You are annoying.

Yes. Because instead you are supposed to mute, report, and move on, which induces less drama and actually gets stuff done.

none of what i said was comments on their in game performance i could care less if a teammate lost his lane i wont flame him for that.
enemy camped me and failed so naturally i trash talked them , competitive bs is by all means allowed by riot.
and my jhin thought i was feeding because i was perma camped and 4/7 is a very good score after the camp i received  so i wasnt making any comments while he fed his ass botlane i was only defending myself and showing that he's not actually doing any better ;).
i understand people have feelings and i never try to hurt them but when i get an obnoxious enemy jungler who camps me for no reason even tho im not easy to gank at all i wasnt giving any openings he just enjoyed the sport of it and ended up dying all the time trying to dive me ofc i'll say something and what i said was hardly toxic compared to what he did , getting banned for saying trash and idiot ? that's ridiculous.

Yeah, like Imperial Pandaa said, maybe by itself this wouldn't be worthy of a chat restriction. But the system is closer to a bucket being filled with water, once you pass certain thresholds you'll receive a punishment.

i asked them to show me why i was punished i dont care about buckets where is the proof of my toxicity ? this up there isnt very nice but its not toxic either if every child gets offended and reports then riot listens we wont be finished

If you see no problems with those chat logs then soon more chat restrictions and bans will follow, up to a perma ban. So if I were you I would think about a pause from the game, changing your attitude and maybe gain a bit of maturity on the way. Would make you and your surroundings a little bit more happy.

i dont enjoy playing league anymore because of how unbalanced it's become and how childish the support's become along with the community.
but i dont enjoy any other game anymore and i just play to waste time.
